text:
They'd been emptied,/ Strong and double-blind,/ Neither side seeking.

/ They'd watched/ Only for the soled walkers/ That passed between,/ Posed mostly/ For the souled captors/ That paused.

/ They'd heard words like mine:/ Unsung words/ Stung with a bit of dropsy.

/ Swollen up to barely fit together,

/ Classical capstone be demanded,/ Forgotten,/ And reprimanded./
